typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		title as string,
		year as string,
		cast as string[],
		genres as string[]
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'document',
	systemColumns: true,
	throughput: 2000) ~> source1
DerivedColumn1 alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
source1 derive(title = title+'_updated') ~> DerivedColumn1
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		title as string,
		year as string,
		cast as string[],
		genres as string[]
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'document',
	partitionKey: ['/title'],
	throughput: 2000) ~> sink1
